Class PropertiesUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • oshi.json.util.PropertiesUtil

extends java.lang.Object
    Convenience methods for manipulating properties files for JSON use

    widdis[at]gmail[dot]com

      • getBoolean

        public static boolean getBoolean​(java.util.Properties properties,
                                 java.lang.String property)
        Parses the (string) value of a property and determines whether it is true
        Parameters:
        properties - The properties to search
        property - The property to evaluate
        Returns:
        False if the property is set to "false"; true otherwise

      • getIntOrDefault

        public static int getIntOrDefault​(java.util.Properties properties,
                                  java.lang.String property,
                                  int defaultInt)
        Parses the (string) value of a property and determines its integer value
        Parameters:
        properties - The properties to search
        property - The property to evaluate
        defaultInt - The default if the property is missing
        Returns:
        The integer value if parseable, or the default, otherwise

      • getString

        public static java.lang.String getString​(java.util.Properties properties,
                                         java.lang.String property)
        Parses the (string) value of a property and determines its string value
        Parameters:
        properties - The properties to search
        property - The property to evaluate
        Returns:
        The string value if parseable, or the string "null", otherwise

      • getEnum

        public static <T extends java.lang.Enum<T>> T getEnum​(java.util.Properties properties,
                                                      java.lang.String property,
                                                      java.lang.Class<T> enumClass)
        Parses the (string) value of a property and determines its enum value
        Type Parameters:
        T - An enum type
        Parameters:
        properties - The properties to search
        property - The property to evaluate
        enumClass - The class of enum to return
        Returns:
        The enum value if parseable, or null, otherwise
